entry.title: Derby Originals 600D Shimmering Star Ripstop Waterproof Nylon Medium Weight Mini Horse and Pony Turnout Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 34.95

Our 600D Shimmering Star Ripstop Waterproof Nylon Medium Weight Mini Horse and Pony Turnout Blankets were designed to offer an adorable, colorful, yet still hardy blanket option for the little equine in your life! These blankets are a mix of fun pink and purple stars on a pink background with purple accenting and a pink and purple striped trim. This blanket has all your favorite turnout blanket features: front chest buckles, a shoulder gusset, a fleece wither protector, crossed belly straps, removable elastic leg straps, and a tail cover.


Waterproof Construction: this blanket is made from a waterproof nylon material covered in a  Teflon coating. These blankets are guaranteed to be fully waterproof unless the blanket is ripped/torn, or the Teflon coating is damaged through improper washing or cleaning, or abuse of the blanket.

  • THE PERFECT WINTER BLANKET - this blanket is the perfect winter blanket for almost any horse and climate, due to it’s highly adjustable and classic features, hefty 250g of Polyfil, and sturdy ripstop nylon shell.
  • COMFORTABLE, ADJUSTABLE FIT - this blanket features a shoulder gusset for an advanced freedom of movement, a soft fleece wither protector, and a soft 210T nylon inner lining to prevent irritation on the hair coat.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MINIS AND PONIES - this blanket was designed to best fit the bodies of miniature horses and pony breeds, who often differ in conformation when compared to horses.
  • RIPSTOP NYLON OUTER SHELL - this blanket features a 600D ripstop nylon construction that is extremely tear and cut resistant, meaning that you can leave your horse in the barn or at pasture without worry of a blanket tear.
  • ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER’S WARRANTY - this blanket comes with a one year manufacturer’s warranty through Derby Originals, which protects against manufacturing and quality defects.

Sizing Information

This turnout blanket is sized in the same manner that you will size any other horse blanket: by measuring, in inches, from the center of your horse’s chest to the end of your horse’s rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size.

 

Product Information

Blanket Style: Turnout Blanket

Waterproof: Yes

Breathable: Yes

Weight: Medium Weight

Material: Nylon

Denier: 600

Ripstop: Yes

Tail Cover: Yes

Wither Protector: Yes

Shoulder Gussets: Yes

Polyfill: 250g

Inner Lining: 210T Nylon

Belly Closure: Crossed Surcingles

Leg Straps: Crossed Elastic

Colors Available: Shimmering Star

Sizes Available: 36”, 40”, 44”, 48”, 54”, 58”, 60”, 62”, 64”, and 66”

entry.title: Set of 2 Horse Blanket Surcingle Repair for Blankets Hardware Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Blanket Accessories
Price: 5.99

Use this handy kit to repair your broken blanket straps. The surcingle replacement buckle and slider can replace the hardware on any belly surcingle straps. These can be used on any brand such as weatherbeeta, and weight blankets including lightweight and heavyweight. These are a great alternative to buying brand new blankets and turnouts. They are great for leg straps too!
  • QUANTITY- Sold in lot of 2 (3 pieces per lot)
  • SIZING- 2" Buckle and Sliders
  • USAGES - Great for belly surcingles on blankets

entry.title: Removable Adjustable Elastic Leg Straps Pair for Horse Blankets & Sheets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Blanket Accessories
Price: 10.99

No need to give away that old broken blanket. These adjustable leg straps are ready to take the place of those old missing or broken ones. These leg straps feature an unique loop design that helps improve safety and reduces injury.
  • Adjustable 1" webbing with snaps on one end
  • One size fits all
  • Includes two replacement leg straps

entry.title: Derby Originals Nordic-Tough 1200D All Season Reflective Waterproof Mini Horse Pony Turnout Sheet with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Sheets
Price: 64.99 - 79.99 (30 variants)

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse sheet by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy sheet is made from durable and high quality materials.
  • INNOVATIVE, MODERN BLANKET DESIGN - our Nordic-Tough reflective blanket series is new for 2019 and boasts new features such as quick-clip double chest buckles, adjust-to-fit neck straps, a safety reflective bodied design, contoured fit, 210T lining, and more.
  • DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout sheet was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this sheet is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.
  • DESIGNED FOR ALL-SEASON USE — this rain sheet was designed to protect your horse from the elements and is ideal for keeping your horse dry in wet or snowy weather, or using in cool weather for added warmth.
  • 2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

entry.title: Derby Originals Nordic-Tough 600D Medium Weight Reflective Waterproof Winter Mini Horse Pony Turnout Blanket 200g with 1 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 64.99 - 79.99 (60 variants)

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made from durable and high quality materials.

INNOVATIVE, MODERN BLANKET DESIGN - our Nordic-Tough reflective blanket series is new for 2019 and boasts new features such as quick-clip double chest buckles, adjust-to-fit neck straps, a safety reflective bodied design, contoured fit, and more.

DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout blanket was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this blanket is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.

DURABLE TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - this blanket features a soft but strong 210T inner lining, 200g of polyfil insulation that provides extra warmth without overheating, and a sturdy 600D nylon exterior that is ripstop, breathable, and waterproof.

1 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 1 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

 

Care Instructions

 

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

entry.title: Derby Originals Reflective Safety No Hardware Winter Foal Turnout Blanket 600D Medium Weight 150g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Foal Blankets
Price: 39.99 - 49.99 (21 variants)

Derby Originals Reflective Safety Winter Blanket for Foals are a better and more modern solution to outdated foal blanket designs. Our foal blanket features a pair of adjustable double-velcro chest straps that allow for the blanket to be adjusted to fit smaller or larger foals. These chest straps are elastic to allow for a more comfortable and snug fit, which helps keep your foal safe and from becoming tangled. This blanket also features matching elastic double-velcro belly straps for the best possible fit. All four chest and belly straps are covered in reflective tape to greatly increase visibility and help keep your foal safe outside or in the pasture. We're proud to be the original inventor of the hardware free foal blanket, which has no metal parts to increase your foal's comfort and safety. Our innovative blanket also has a pair of adjust-to-fit neck-straps to allow for a better fit around the neck opening. Our blankets come with an oversized tail cover that is held in place with 3 sturdy velcro tabs and can be removed and replaced as needed. Our blankets are made of 600D, ripstop, waterproof, windproof, and snowproof nylon, which is durable and designed for indoor and outdoor use. This blanket has 150 grams of PolyFil filling, which is designed to keep your foal warm without overheating in temperatures down to 10° F. Our blankets have been designed with care to last and keep your foals comfortable and are backed by a one-year limited warranty.


  • DESIGNED TO GROW WITH YOUR FOAL - our safety blankets have adjustable straps and elastic on the chest and belly straps to allow for the best fit possible. Our blankets can adjust by 6" so they fit your foal for longer and can fit multiple foals.
  • NO HARDWARE DESIGN KEEPS YOUR FOAL SAFE - this blanket is metal-free for increased safety. This, combined with other features such as a reflective design, adjustable neck straps, and a padded belly band, increases both your foal's safety and comfort.
  • AVAILABLE IN THREE SIZES - our foal blankets are available in three sizes to fit most Small, Medium, and Large foals. Size Small is recommended for most newborn foals. Sizes Medium and Large will also fit most mini horses as well as larger foals.
  • SIZING RECOMMENDATIONS FOR MINIS - Please note that the back length and belly straps are shorter as these blankets are meant to fit foals. We do not recommend the size Small for any mini horse, only sizes Medium and Large, and recommend sizing up.
  • 1 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 1-year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Accidents and normal wear and tear are not covered. To register your product, visit Derby Originals' website.

entry.title: Derby Originals Classic 600D Medium Weight Waterproof Winter Mini Horse Pony Turnout Blanket 200g with 1 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 54.99 - 64.99 (48 variants)

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made from durable and high quality materials.

THE PERFECT EVERYDAY BLANKET - this versatile blanket was designed to fit foals, miniature horses, and pony breeds and be the perfect every-day blanket for chilly autumn, winter, and spring weather and for use in both dry and wet conditions.

DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout blanket was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this blanket is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.

DURABLE TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - this blanket features a soft but strong 210T inner lining, 200g of polyfil insulation that provides extra warmth without overheating, and a sturdy 600D nylon exterior that is ripstop, breathable, and waterproof.

1 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 1 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

entry.title: Derby Originals Wind Storm West Coast 420D Medium Weight Water Resistant Mini Horse Pony Winter Stable Blanket 200g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Blankets
Price: 49.99 - 64.99 (45 variants)

Derby Originals’ latest line of ultra-premium winter blankets, the Windstorm Series, was designed to offer a myriad of blanket options in material, weight, and design for equines of all sizes. This comprehensive line features stable and turnout blankets and sheets available in a plethora of beautiful, modern colors in every size from 36” all the way up to rare 100” large draft horse sizing. These blankets are not only beautiful but designed to be hardy and long-lasting with even the most destructive horses.

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium stable blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This indoor blanket is made from high quality materials.

OPEN FRONT DESIGN - this blanket features a pair of quick-clip adjustable buckles on the chest that make this blanket easy and convenient to take on and off. This adjustable chest design also allows this blanket to better fit your horse.

DESIGNED FOR MAXIMUM INDOOR COMFORT - this premium stable blanket was designed to be warm, draft and wind-resistant, breathable, water-resistant, and comfortable to wear no matter how long your horse is blanketed indoors.

REINFORCED SURCINGLE AND LEG STRAPS - this blanket features sturdy and attractive leather reinforcements around the belly surcingles and leg straps to prevent excess wear.

ADJUST TO FIT NECK - this blanket features an adjustable neck strap on either side so that you can make sure your blanket fits snugly and comfortably on your horse, and prevent rain or snow from getting under the blanket.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

Sizing Information: to size this blanket, measure (in inches) from the center of your horse’s chest, to the end of your horse’s rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size.

STURDY VELCRO BELLY BAND CLOSURE - these stable blankets feature a secure fold-over velcro design along the back to allow for a highly adjustable fit that prevents dangerous dangling straps.

ADJUST TO FIT NECK - this blanket features an adjustable neck strap on either side so that you can make sure your blanket fits snugly and comfortably on your horse, and prevent rain or snow from getting under the blanket.

All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer.
